question: Economics deals primarily with the concept of
Scarcity exists when
Option 1: the price of a good rises.
Option 2: society can meet the wants of every individual.
Option 3: there is less of a good or resource available than people wish to have.
Option 4: there is less than an infinite amount of a resource or good.
Answer: there is less of a good or resource available than people wish to have.

question: Economics is defined as the study of
Option 1: how society manages its scarce resources.
Answer: how society manages its scarce resources.
